metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6291 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the function expr6 in eval.c in NetwideAssembler (NASM) through 2.14.02. There is a stack exhaustion problemcaused by the expr6 function making recursive calls to itself in certainscenarios involving lots of '!' or '+' or '-' characters. Remote attackerscould leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via acrafted asm file.

criterions.comment: nasm package in esm-apps/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-04-25').
